hotels.title: New Zealand Five-Star Lake Pukaki Boutique Estate with Private Villas
hotels.description: Immerse yourself in New Zealandâ€™s pristine nature with a stay at the luxurious five-star Mt Cook Lakeside Retreat, High Country Estate - boasting uninterrupted views of Lake Pukaki and the surrounding mountain ranges. Experience utmost seclusion with a private villa stay, and indulge in a romantic evening beneath the canopy of stars at the estate's observatory, with the piece de resistance being the garden-to-plate dining at Moraine Lodge restaurant with a grand degustation menu.
